summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4788 for the improvement of 19th Avenue North, and same produced from Boyer Avenue to Interlaken Boulevard, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55283, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
